players.name: David Raya
players.bio: Spanish goalkeeper with excellent distribution and shot-stopping ability

players.name: William Saliba
players.bio: Young defensive rock, exceptional ball-playing center back

players.name: Gabriel Magalhães
players.bio: Brazilian defender with aerial dominance and leadership qualities

players.name: Ben White
players.bio: Versatile defender, converted to right-back with great success

players.name: Oleksandr Zinchenko
players.bio: Inverted full-back with exceptional passing and midfield instincts

players.name: Declan Rice
players.bio: Complete midfielder, dominant in duels and progressive passing

players.name: Martin Ødegaard
players.bio: Arsenal captain, creative maestro with elite vision and technique

players.name: Bukayo Saka
players.bio: Electric winger, Arsenal's starboy with pace, creativity and end product

players.name: Gabriel Martinelli
players.bio: Brazilian speedster with direct running and clinical finishing

players.name: Kai Havertz
players.bio: Versatile forward with technical quality and intelligent movement

players.name: Gabriel Jesus
players.bio: Dynamic striker with exceptional pressing and link-up play

players.name: Thierry Henry
players.bio: Arsenal's greatest ever player. 228 goals, 4x Golden Boot, Invincibles hero (1999-2007)

players.name: Dennis Bergkamp
players.bio: The Non-Flying Dutchman. Magical technique, 120 goals, redefined the playmaker role (1995-2006)

players.name: Patrick Vieira
players.bio: Invincibles captain. Dominant midfielder, 3 Premier Leagues, 4 FA Cups (1996-2005)

players.name: Robert Pires
players.bio: French winger with silky skills. 2 Premier Leagues, key Invincible (2000-2006)

players.name: Tony Adams
players.bio: Mr. Arsenal. One-club legend, 4 league titles, defensive colossus (1983-2002)

players.name: Ian Wright
players.bio: Legendary striker. 185 goals, club record holder until Henry (1991-1998)

players.name: Arsène Wenger
players.bio: Legendary manager. 3 Premier Leagues, 7 FA Cups, The Invincibles architect (1996-2018)

players.name: Liam Brady
players.bio: Irish maestro. Creative midfielder, FA Cup winner, 70s icon (1973-1980)

players.name: Ivan Toney
players.bio: Brentford striker. Clinical finisher, 20+ goals last season, proven Premier League quality

players.name: Victor Osimhen
players.bio: Napoli superstar. Explosive pace, elite finishing, Serie A champion and top scorer

players.name: Martín Zubimendi
players.bio: Real Sociedad anchor. Excellent ball retention, press resistant, perfect Arteta midfielder

players.name: Eberechi Eze
players.bio: Crystal Palace playmaker. Dribbling wizard, creative spark, homegrown talent

players.name: Viktor Gyökeres
players.bio: Sporting CP sensation. 43 goals this season, physical striker with elite movement
